content: I'm sure I must be badly reading something, but how come I can't call visit_all_item_likes?

error[E0599]: no method named `visit_all_item_likes` found for reference `&rustc_hir::Crate<'_>` in the current scope
  --> creusot/src/validate.rs:29:25
   |
29 |   ctx.tcx.hir().krate().visit_all_item_likes(&mut law_visitor);
   |                         ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ method not found in `&rustc_hir::Crate<'_>`

Yet looking at the docs: 

pub fn visit_all_item_likes<'hir, V>(&'hir self, visitor: &mut V) where
    V: ItemLikeVisitor<'hir>,
Ah, answered my own question: I should do tcx.hir().visit_all_item_likes(&mut law_visitor) the call to .krate() was unnecessary. The docs should be updated in itemlikevisit.rs
Xavier Denis has marked this topic as resolved.

Xavier Denis said:

Ah, answered my own question: I should do tcx.hir().visit_all_item_likes(&mut law_visitor) the call to .krate() was unnecessary. The docs should be updated in itemlikevisit.rs

@Xavier Denis Feel free to open a PR to update the docs :)
